----------lsb_release -a----------
Distributor ID:	Quemos
Description:	QuemOS 1.3
Release:	1.3
Codename:	1.3
----------/etc/os-release----------
PRETTY_NAME="QuemOS 1.3"
NAME="QuemOS"
VERSION_ID="1.3"
VERSION="1.3"
VERSION_CODENAME=1.3
ID=quemos
HOME_URL="https://quemos.github.io/"
SUPPORT_URL="https://quemos.github.io/support"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.quemos.github.io/"
----------/etc/debian_version----------
11.6
